name: Purrfect Rescue
description:
😸 A portion of the profit from this game will be allocated to street cat rescue and support initiatives. 😻

Purrfect Rescue is a hidden object game where you need to find cats in urban scenarios. There are 5 different scenarios, each with 101 cats to be found.

Features:


​🎵​ Original soundtrack.
🐾 5 different scenarios.
🐈 505 cats to find.
😺 5 special cats with their rescue stories.
🧩 Game experience designed for both think and relax.
